trans-unit.source: Provides information for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.BeforeSend"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.AfterResponse"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 정보를 제공는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.BeforeSend"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.AfterResponse"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"></xref> class.
The T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity that threw the event associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연결 된 이벤트를 발생 시킨 T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity"></xref> that threw the event associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity"> </xref> 하는 관련 된이 이벤트에서 발생 했습니다 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity"></xref> that threw the event associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity"> </xref> 하는 관련 된이 이벤트에서 발생 했습니다 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs"> </xref>합니다.
